hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Ikrimah, from Ibn 'Abbas, that :the Prophet (ﷺ) set the blood money at twelve thousand (Dirham). He said: “This is what Allah says: 'And they could not find any cause to do so except that Allah and his Messenger (ﷺ) had enriched them of His bounty.'” He said: “By their taking the blood money.”

chapter.eng-name: The Blood Money For Killing By Mistake.
